verses.verse: And if his <S%H7133>oblation<s%> be a <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of peace <S%H8002>offering<s%>, if he <S%H7126>offer<s%> it of the <S%H1241>herd<s%>; whether it be a <S%H2145>male<s%> or <S%H5347>female<s%>, he shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> it without <S%H8549>blemish<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

And he shall <S%H5564>lay<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> upon the <S%H7218>head<s%> of his <S%H7133>offering<s%>, and <S%H7819>kill<s%> it at the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%>: and <S%H175>Aaron's<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> the <S%H3548>priests<s%> shall <S%H2236>sprinkle<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> upon the <S%H4196>altar<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%>.

And he shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> of the <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of the peace <S%H8002>offering<s%> an offering made by <S%H801>fire<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>; the <S%H2459>fat<s%> that <S%H3680>covereth<s%> the <S%H7130>inwards<s%>, and all the <S%H2459>fat<s%> that is upon the <S%H7130>inwards<s%>,

And the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3629>kidneys<s%>, and the <S%H2459>fat<s%> that is on them, which is by the <S%H3689>flanks<s%>, and the <S%H3508>caul<s%> above the <S%H3516>liver<s%>, with the <S%H3629>kidneys<s%>, it shall he take <S%H5493>away<s%>.

And <S%H175>Aaron's<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> shall <S%H6999>burn<s%> it on the <S%H4196>altar<s%> upon the burnt <S%H5930>sacrifice<s%>, which is upon the <S%H6086>wood<s%> that is on the <S%H784>fire<s%>: it is an offering made by <S%H801>fire<s%>, of a <S%H5207>sweet<s%> <S%H7381>savour<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

¶ And if his <S%H7133>offering<s%> for a <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of peace <S%H8002>offering<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> be of the <S%H6629>flock<s%>; <S%H2145>male<s%> or <S%H5347>female<s%>, he shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> it without <S%H8549>blemish<s%>.
If he <S%H7126>offer<s%> a <S%H3775>lamb<s%> for his <S%H7133>offering<s%>, then shall he <S%H7126>offer<s%> it <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

And he shall <S%H5564>lay<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> upon the <S%H7218>head<s%> of his <S%H7133>offering<s%>, and <S%H7819>kill<s%> it <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%>: and <S%H175>Aaron's<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> shall <S%H2236>sprinkle<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> thereof round <S%H5439>about<s%> upon the <S%H4196>altar<s%>.

And he shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> of the <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of the peace <S%H8002>offering<s%> an offering made by <S%H801>fire<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>; the <S%H2459>fat<s%> thereof, and the <S%H8549>whole<s%> <S%H451>rump<s%>, it shall he take <S%H5493>off<s%> <S%H5980>hard<s%> by the <S%H6096>backbone<s%>; and the <S%H2459>fat<s%> that <S%H3680>covereth<s%> the <S%H7130>inwards<s%>, and all the <S%H2459>fat<s%> that is upon the <S%H7130>inwards<s%>,

And the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3629>kidneys<s%>, and the <S%H2459>fat<s%> that is upon them, which is by the <S%H3689>flanks<s%>, and the <S%H3508>caul<s%> above the <S%H3516>liver<s%>, with the <S%H3629>kidneys<s%>, it shall he take <S%H5493>away<s%>.
And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H6999>burn<s%> it upon the <S%H4196>altar<s%>: it is the <S%H3899>food<s%> of the offering made by <S%H801>fire<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.
¶ And if his <S%H7133>offering<s%> be a <S%H5795>goat<s%>, then he shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> it <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

And he shall <S%H5564>lay<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> upon the <S%H7218>head<s%> of it, and <S%H7819>kill<s%> it <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%>: and the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> shall <S%H2236>sprinkle<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> thereof upon the <S%H4196>altar<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%>.

And he shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> thereof his <S%H7133>offering<s%>, even an offering made by <S%H801>fire<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>; the <S%H2459>fat<s%> that <S%H3680>covereth<s%> the <S%H7130>inwards<s%>, and all the <S%H2459>fat<s%> that is upon the <S%H7130>inwards<s%>,

And the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3629>kidneys<s%>, and the <S%H2459>fat<s%> that is upon them, which is by the <S%H3689>flanks<s%>, and the <S%H3508>caul<s%> above the <S%H3516>liver<s%>, with the <S%H3629>kidneys<s%>, it shall he take <S%H5493>away<s%>.

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H6999>burn<s%> them upon the <S%H4196>altar<s%>: it is the <S%H3899>food<s%> of the offering made by <S%H801>fire<s%> for a <S%H5207>sweet<s%> <S%H7381>savour<s%>: all the <S%H2459>fat<s%> is the <S%H3068>LORD's<s%>.

It shall be a <S%H5769>perpetual<s%> <S%H2708>statute<s%> for your <S%H1755>generations<s%> throughout all your <S%H4186>dwellings<s%>, that ye <S%H398>eat<s%> neither <S%H2459>fat<s%> nor <S%H1818>blood<s%>.
